00036 #ifndef timersub
00037 # define timersub(a, b, result)                                               \
00038 do {                                                                        \
00039     (result)->tv_sec = (a)->tv_sec - (b)->tv_sec;                             \
00040     (result)->tv_usec = (a)->tv_usec - (b)->tv_usec;                          \
00041     if ((result)->tv_usec < 0) {                                              \
00042         --(result)->tv_sec;                                                     \
00043        (result)->tv_usec += 1000000;                                           \
00044     }                                                                         \
00045 } while (0)
00046 #endif
